name: Priti and the loaded dice
description:
*WE RECOMEND PLAYING THE WINDOWS VERSION, THE WEB ONE HAS MORE BUGS*

Instructions:
Load the indicated side (yellowed) to win, at the end of the match a dice will roll and the more loaded your side is the more probable is that you win.

To load the dice kill some enemies, grab the drops and throw them in the indicated side of the dice!

Controls:

Keyboard

Arrow keys -> Move
Z -> Jump
X -> Kick
C -> Grab

XBox Gamepad

Left stick / Arrows -> Move
A  -> Jump
X -> Kick
RB -> Grab
